Also i know that many of you want me to put links which i will in time but until i get a significant number of the mods in, i will not put links yet for i lack the personal time due to RL stuff

before posting a report about a mod please refer to majirs rules about confirmation in the official thread at the top

Edited July 18, 2014 by Helix935
Procedural Parts/KSPAPI appears to be inop, at least temporarily.

Procedural Parts/KSPAPI appears to be inop, at least temporarily.

noted dlrk
Better Atmospheres appears to work, so EVE, Custom Asteroids, Kittopia, and BA should all be added.

Better Atmospheres appears to work, so EVE, Custom Asteroids, Kittopia, and BA should all be added.

there noted
Navyfish's docking indicator, Editor Extensions, selectroot works, scansat are OK, FAR has an updated version already, PreciseNode and KAS are broken.

FASA

PappoloPanel

EnhancedNavBall

These also work
Kerbal Engineer does not work. The parts are there and available, but various error messages show up in the data windows.
Does anyone know about the Astronomer's Pack V3 for EVE?

*sniffles* community i am sad to say that KAS is incompatible;.;....

Edit: and also firespitter

Edit2: *squints* ooh flashcactus already confirmed kas whoops

Edited July 18, 2014 by Helix935

Kerbal Engineer Redux works if you use Padishar's fixes.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72062-Test-of-continuing-KER-developments-0-24
Can confirm BlueHarvest doesn't work.
kerbal alarm clock seems to be working fine

Does anyone know about the Astronomer's Pack V3 for EVE?

It works fine.

It works fine.

Awesome, thanks tygoo7!
RSS doesn't work.
What's this Firespitter not working stuff? The latest prelease's (7.0PRE2) animation modules work fine. The engines may not, but all cargo bays and things that move using it should be fine.

B9 Aerospace with the 0.23.5 patch is working fine, I've tested both the cargo bays and the SABRE engines and they're working without issue.

Also working:

EVE with Astronomer's pack

Near Future

RemoteTech2

Interstellar is appearing to be working, but I have not tested it thoroughly.

TextureReplacer

B9 with the Reduced Texture pack works without issue in the 64 bit KSP, but the hi-res version crashes on startup.

Edited July 18, 2014 by Raven.
MechJeb has been updated for 2.4

For the love of the kraken, please don't assume that just because you don't get a "This mod is incompatible" message, that the mod is compatible. Quite the reverse: it means there's no compatibility information in the mod, and therefore you should assume it is not compatible.

Part packs are exempt if they don't rely on plugins.

If the plugin works perfectly under testing, and throws no errors in the output log, only *then* should you rate it as compatible.
Could we get linkified mod names in this thread?

For the love of the kraken, please don't assume that just because you don't get a "This mod is incompatible" message, that the mod is compatible. Quite the reverse: it means there's no compatibility information in the mod, and therefore you should assume it is not compatible.

Part packs are exempt if they don't rely on plugins.

If the plugin works perfectly under testing, and throws no errors in the output log, only *then* should you rate it as compatible.

noted and responded to...
PreciseNode has had an update and the new version appears to work fine in x64.

B9 Aerospace with the 0.23.5 patch is working fine, I've tested both the cargo bays and the SABRE engines and they're working without issue.

Also working:

EVE with Astronomer's pack

Near Future

RemoteTech2

Interstellar is appearing to be working, but I have not tested it thoroughly.

TextureReplacer

B9 with the Reduced Texture pack works without issue in the 64 bit KSP, but the hi-res version crashes on startup.

Unless something has changed in the way the config file works, changing a Kerbal's spacesuit and head with Texture Replacer isn't working for me.

Edited July 18, 2014 by TheMariner
KAS is not working in the current version available.
